node.name: opendir - open a directory
node.description: Opens a directory named EXPR for processing by [perlfunc:readdir|readdir()], [perlfunc:telldir|telldir()], [perlfunc:seekdir|seekdir()], [perlfunc:rewinddir|rewinddir()], and [perlfunc:closedir|closedir()]. Returns TRUE if successful. DIRHANDLEs have their own namespace separate from FILEHANDLEs.
node.title: perlfunc:opendir
